text: Graciete Moreira Carneiro Santana (12 October 1980 â€“ 16 September 2021) was a Brazilian long distance runner. She placed 128th in the athletics marathon at the 2016 Summer Olympics.Graciete Santana . rio2016.com Santana began running to help her beat bulimia.Graciete Santana . nbcolympics.com Santana was born in Serra Preta, Brazil.Graciete Santana . cob.org.br Santana died on 16 September 2021 from melanoma in Feira de Santana, Brazil at the age of 40. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian athletes Category:Long-distance runners Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Deaths from melanoma Category:Sportspeople from Bahia
